summary: A powerful dagger that is a gift from the gods, Can be found in Dead Mans drink tavern in Falkreath, the dagger have great powers.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that adds a powerful dagger to your game, storys about the knife says that it was the god smith Hallarus, that created the dagger. The dagger disappeared, and was forgotten, until now...

You can find the dagger in a chest inside Dead Mans drink tavern in Falkreath.

Installation:
just drag and drop the file into your skyrim data directory.
author: bobban1997
